text: Irene Maud Lentz (December 8, 1901 - November 15, 1962) "Irene", in Suicide in the Entertainment Industry: An Encyclopedia of 840 Twentieth Century Cases, by David K. Frasier (McFarland, 2005) p156-157 was an American costume designer. She made costumes for many movie stars. She designed costumes for actresses like Hedy Lamarr, Ingrid Bergman and Marlene Dietrich in the 1930s and the 1940s. On November 15, 1962, Lentz jumped to her death out a hotel window near Los Angeles. ==References== Category:People from Montana Category:Suicides Category:1900 births Category:1962 deaths Category:American costume designers
title: Irene Lentz
